name: Space Force Mechanic VR
description:
You just started in a branch of the military that has no idea what they’re doing. Your boss told you to get on a shuttle to a space station where you would ‘make it great again’, whatever that means. Now, you’re stuck on this space station that is falling apart and it’s up to you to save the world!… or something like that.

VR project completed for a 48 hour game jam. Tight survive-as-long-as-you can multitasking game with zero gravity swimming controls. Supports Oculus Rift
